### install and load some tidyverse packages, palmerpenguins

```{webr-r}

install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("ggplot2")
install.packages("palmerpenguins")
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)




```

### look at the data set

```{webr-r}

glimpse(penguins)


```

### sample plot

```{webr-r}

penguins |>
  group_by(species) |>
  summarize(avgFlippers=mean(flipper_length_mm, na.rm=TRUE)) |>
  ggplot(mapping=aes(x=species, y=avgFlippers, fill=species)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")


```
